input_text:
Job Title: .Net Developer

Location: Tulsa, OK

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, OakTree Staffing Services, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!

Net Developer

Location: Tulsa, OK

Description

We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior .NET Developer to join our dynamic software development team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in developing high-quality, scalable, and secure web applications using C#, ASP.NET, ASP.NET Core, Entity Framework and Web API. This role involves designing and implementing both client-side and server-side architecture for our web applications, ensuring the highest level of security and efficiency. The successful candidate will be adept at creating database schemas that represent and support business processes and have experience with API and web application security practices.

Responsibilities

Design, develop, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code using C#, MVC, ASP.NET, and ASP.NET Core.Build and maintain web applications using Web API, HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, and other web technologies.Implement and consume Web APIs in web applications to facilitate communication between systems.Ensure application security by implementing best practices in API and web application security.Participate in all phases of the software development lifecycle, including requirements analysis, design, development, testing, deployment, and maintenance.Develop and manage well-functioning databases and applications using SQL.Work collaboratively in a team environment to develop high-quality web applications that meet or exceed project requirements.Implement continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines to streamline development and deployment processes.Use Git and or TFS for version control and collaborate with team members on code development and integration.Stay up to date with the latest developments in web application development and security practices.

Requirements

Bachelor s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.Proven experience as a .NET Developer with a strong background in C#, MVC, ASP.NET, and ASP.NET Core.Proficiency in Web API and experience with SOAP Services.Strong understanding of HTML5, CSS, and Bootstrap for front-end development.Solid experience with SQL and database design.In-depth knowledge of API and web application security practices.Experience with CI/CD tools and best practices.Proficient understanding of Git and TFS for version control.Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a team environment.Strong communication skills and the ability to work closely with other developers and product owners.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

Build and maintain web applications using Web API, HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, and other web technologies.
Implement and consume Web APIs in web applications to facilitate communication between systems.
Ensure application security by implementing best practices in API and web application security.
Participate in all phases of the software development lifecycle, including requirements analysis, design, development, testing, deployment, and maintenance.
Develop and manage well-functioning databases and applications using SQL.
Work collaboratively in a team environment to develop high-quality web applications that meet or exceed project requirements.
Implement continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines to streamline development and deployment processes.
